questName: Recipe for Disaster Freeing the Mountain Dwarf

questSteps.stepDescription: Head to the Rising Sun Inn pub in Falador.
Ask Emily about dwarves and ale. (Chat 2•2)
Head to The Pick and Lute pub in Taverley.
Add 1 gold coin to each glass of ale.
additionalStepInformation: You can take coins out of your money pouch by right clicking the price checker in your inventory and selecting withdraw

questSteps.stepDescription: Head to the tunnel under White Wolf Mountain.
additionalStepInformation: Cave north of Taverley lodestone leads to that tunnel.

questSteps.stepDescription: Talk to Rohak, the Old Dwarf. You must finish this dialogue to proceed.
Use 4 Asgoldian ales on him and then, after the fade, quickly use another on him.
Talk to Rohak to give him one-hundred Coins, a Bucket of milk, an Egg, a Pot of flour, and a Bowl of water.
Quickly pick up the Dwarven rock cake whilst wearing gloves.
additionalStepInformation: If the cake is not picked up fast enough, the ingredients are required to make another one.

questSteps.stepDescription: If ice gloves were not worn, either drop the cake and pick it up with ice gloves equipped or kill an icefiend with it in your inventory.
additionalStepInformation: If ice gloves were worn whilst picking up the cake, simply return to Lumbridge.

questSteps.stepDescription: Use the cooled rock cake on the Dwarf.
